name: ClostridiumPerfringensInfectionTestsForCPerfringensEnterotoxin
title: Clostridium perfringens Infection (Tests for C perfringens Enterotoxin)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of C perfringens Enterotoxin),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: C perfringens Enterotoxin),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
